content: I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It can be incredibly stressful and overwhelming to be struggling in school. Remember, though, this doesn't define your worth or your future. There are always options and support available to help you get back on track. Have you had a chance to talk to a teacher, counselor, or someone you trust about how you're feeling? They might be able to offer some guidance or resources that could make a difference. You're not alone in this, and it's okay to ask for help.
